org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.api.notify

Interface NotificationService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BrokerService
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MountInstance, MountProvisionInstance, NotificationPublishService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BackwardsCompatibleMountPoint, MountPointImpl, NotificationPublishServiceProxy, NotificationServiceProxy, SimpleNotificationPublishService

    public interface NotificationService
extends BrokerService
    NotificationService provides access to the notification functionality of the SAL. NotificationService allows for consumption of notifications by registering implementations of NotificationListener. The registration of notification listeners could be done by:
    • returning an instance of implementation in the return value of Provider.getProviderFunctionality()
    • passing an instance of implementation and QName of an RPC as an argument to Broker.ProviderSession.addRpcImplementation(QName, org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.api.RpcImplementation)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.opendaylight.yangtools.concepts.ListenerRegistration<NotificationListener> addNotificationListener(org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.common.QName notification, NotificationListener listener)
      Registers a notification listener for supplied notification type.
